header.topics: Northern Cyprus in the 60s and 70s, going to cultural events such as going to the opera, going skiing in Turkey, Jennifer's career as a deputy head teacher, a comparison of education, secondary modern schools and grammar schools in the UK in the 80s and 90s, what it's like teaching in higher education today
header.activity: Two acquaintances discussing matters of interest to them
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, inquiring, complaining, advising, anecdote telling

speaker.fls: French -- level unspecified; German -- level unspecified
